body.p: A transformation action can be applied on a batch of selected files from the contextual menu of the Project view without having to open the files involved in the transformation. The following actions are available from this contextual menu:

dlentry.dd: Applies the transformation scenario associated to each of the selected files. If the currently processed file does not have an associated transformation scenario then a warning is displayed in the Warnings view.
Opens a dialog box that allows you to create, edit, and set default transformation scenarios.
Allows you to select one transformation scenario to be applied to each one of the currently selected files.

body.p: The xsl:message output information is collected and displayed in the Results view. All entries in the Results view point to the location of the code that triggered them.
body.note: When you trigger a batch transformation, the output messages from the previous one are deleted.
